climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: ASTONISHING SOUND -Breathtaking stereo sound with deep bass is delivered with exceptional clarity and zero distortion by two high-sensitivity drivers and a patented bass port.
24H WORRY-FREE BATTERY LIFE - Anker's exclusive, long-life battery technology provides 24 hours of sublime music.
EFFORTLESS CONNECTIVITY -Bluetooth 4.0 ensures instant pairing and maintains a strong connection up to 66 ft.
DESIGNED TO PLAY -Combines a solid, drop-proof build with tactile materials and seamless controls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A3102 Soundcore The Bluetooth Speaker with Superior Sound and Playtime From ANKER, the Choice of 20 Million+ Happy Users Industry-Leading Technology Superior Sound Quality Wherever life takes you, experience your music with powerful stereo sound and crisp, tight bass. Boasting less than 1% total harmonic distortion, Soundcore sounds great even at the highest volumes. Uncompromised Portability To keep Soundcore small but also sounding great, we’ve designed it using a unique spiral bass port design. The result is a clean bass sound you can easily pick up and put in your bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bluetooth speaker for the price
reviews.reviewText: I did some research for the best Bluetooth speaker under $20 (as of Nov 2020). Finalists (that I bought) were:- DOSS SoundBox- Anker Soundcore- OontZ Angle 3 (3rd Gen)The DOSS SoundBox and Anker SoundCore were comparable in max volume. However, the DOSS SoundBox had a better bass due to its larger size. The Angle 3 did not compare at all in terms of volume or bass.The best rugged speaker would be the Anker SoundCore. It has a sturdy, compact build, with little room for water or dirt to make its way inside. It also has nice tactile buttons. Bluetooth connectivity is great, with very little "hiss" during quiet parts in songs.The best bass-y speaker is the DOSS SoundBox. It packs great volume and decent bass (for its size and price range). The battery life is great. I've never run out of battery, even after playing music for 5+ hours. However, it has a noticeable "hiss" during quiet parts of songs, but that's if you are listening closely. It also has a habit of shutting off momentarily during silent parts of songs (probably to save power), which cuts out the audio for a bit. If these are things you can't have, go for the Anker SoundCore.Overall, I rate this a 5 stars because it's the best rugged Bluetooth audio speaker I could find for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real Stereo Sound !
reviews.reviewText: I bough this speaker to match up with my other Anker Soundcore speaker so I could get Stereo Sound as advertised. It was very easy to Pair this aspeaker with my excisting Sound core speaker(please read the manual). Once paired, I place the speakers about 5 feet from each other. Anker claims that this is not just two mono speakers playing at the same time, but actual 2-channel separation stereo sound. After pairing the two speakers wirelessly, I connected the main speaker to my CD/Cassette/radio combination via AUX cable(purchased separately) and could not beleive the sound I was getting out of these ! WOW. The battery lasts forever, but they seem to work better when fully charged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was skeptical, turned out best speaker in awhile!!
reviews.reviewText: It's louder than my 20W sound bar that plugs in 110, lasts ridiculously long for as loud as it is and when watching phone at night has a very full sound for movies and games even on my laptop. I am disabled and the microphone on it and range make using voice assistant and also phone calls much better, I can leave my phone in my room and bring speaker out to garage through brickhouse and still have pretty solid connection. I would recommend this to anybody looking for a Bluetooth speaker... And the price can't be beat. I was not paid to make any of this review or given a discount but honestly is one of the best speakers around for the price especially.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the shape and sound, great size a very good purchase last for hrs and hrs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sounds good. Good quality. Easy to pair. I had bought a cheaper brand before this one and couldn't get it to pair and the instructions were lousy. Don't waste your time. Get one of these.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bluetooth speaker.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little Bluetooth speaker – especially for the price. The sound quality is great. It’s very portable and easy to store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For a tiny speaker it definitely surpassed my expectations with clear, crisp sound & volume. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good buy
reviews.reviewText: I am very surprised on how good this thing sounds. Very much worth the buy. Only had for a few days so don’t know how battery life is. Fingers crossed it’s what’s advertised.
Great quality, love the sound and the battery lasts forever!

What else you need in a speaker?Good look,Long, really really long battery,Clear sound,Easily accessible and rubber material so no fear of breaking if dropped accidentally.Go for it guys, its the value for money!! Best speaker till date.

reviews.reviewTitle: Only sound bar you’ll ever need
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd Ankara sound bar I have ordered longest battery life I have ever used! If it get caught in a rain? No worries it keeping on playing100% best choice for all your sound needs!

I am not sure why I was sent a blue speaker. I wanted black as in the picture.This is hard to fit into my environment. So at first, it was a 2 star now I am upgrading the review to a 4 star. Lol. I had to give it away as a gift. My friend loved it so much. Hopefully I get a black for such a good price on my next buy
sounds great, can't beat the price for the quality, only downside is there is not really any bass but oh well
